name: BOREDOOM
description:
Welcome to the mind of a six year old passing time in class, confront some of the worst monsters imaginables with cool and escpectacular mechanics that will make you suffer.

A 2D game were the player will face a new boss in each different level that will make the player suffer and try multiple times to achive the best strategy and winning plan.

Right now this is an early verion of the game and might experience some issues, the sound is not made yet but we are working on it. The bosses are some drawing of the developers drawn back in 2006 and with the help of new technologies brought to live in Unity2D.

We hope you like our new game and let's kill this BOREDOOM.
